title: Augusta County: William B. Gallaher to H. S. Gallaher, July 22, 1861
summary: William B. Gallaher tallies the numbers of deaths, casualties, and prisoners from a "Large Battle." He describes the dead bodies on the field as well as the "Dragoon Saddle" he took from a fallen Yankee horse.
keywords: This letter was transcribed from another transcribed copy.
